storyInfo: The party finally makes it aboard Rhodes Island by following Ceobe, but before their eyes, she becomes something rather strange...

attributes.content: Let's review all the information we have on Rhodes Island so far.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: First, both Big Bob and the High Priest thought they could help us...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Second, Kay said there's someone called the 'Doctor' who can definitely solve our problem...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And lastly, it seems we're finally getting close to their ship!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I just hope they really do have a way of solving this...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey guys, look!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: The three head over to the cliff's edge at Chilchuck's cry. It is then they realize why there was a tinge of worry in his voice.
They see a giant, colossal ship.
It sails across the land, a vessel much larger than any seafaring ship they have seen before.
A massive construct of steel. A city. A... dungeon.
This is it. Rhodes Island.
...My word, a ship that sails on land.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Can we really find a way home there?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think we've got another problem to deal with first.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: How are we going to get on board?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I can't see any entrances, even from here.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Look! I think there's some people approaching the ship.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Looks like a caravan to me.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: A caravan, huh...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Why don't we go talk to them and see if they can bring us aboard?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We're back.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Good work out there.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No problem. Oh, right. We just ran into a party of four looking for help. They're dressed real funny, said they know Ceobe, and were hoping Rhodes Island could help them go home.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Hm? Go home?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: More or less, from what I understand. Would you mind leading the way for them? I'll go talk with Field Operations.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Hello!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: If you came to us for aid, you must be looking for the Doctor or Amiya, right?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Err... Kay did mention a 'Doctor,' so they're probably who we're looking for?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Could you set up a meeting for us?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I have to check your identities first. If you could just follow me—
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Whoa! Really sorry, dropped my things...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: 'Bob's Gourmet Guide'?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You know Big Bob?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Sure do. He cooked us the first meal we had here.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Aye, anyone who can make such a delicious meal out of such hard bugs is admirable in my eyes.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I see. So you're the 'friends' he mentioned.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'm Mudrock. Big Bob told me about you. At the time, he had just decided to leave the mercenary life behind, but had no idea whether starting a farm would be viable.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Farms in the wilderness are often targeted by bandits and looters. He didn't have many business connections, and he wasn't sure if the beer he brewed was any good.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But the joy on your faces as you ate his cooking gave him confidence.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I never realized he was in such dire straits.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Is... Is he alright nowadays?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't know. We haven't met in a long while.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: All I've heard is that his Originium slug beer factory's doing well and making a profit. Seems he's got it made.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Good, good.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: But I also heard that he broke some local laws in the process. Some kind of tax issue. He was sent to jail.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Jail? Are you sure he's still alright?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The most recent news I heard was that he either broke out or made bail. Either way, he's fine.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I guess that's... good?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: A jailbreak, huh...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I've also heard that he set up a grocery store in Sami. Business is good there, apparently.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: He... knows how to persevere, at least.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Anyway, come with me. We'll head up in the elevator.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: 'Elevator'? You mean this iron box? How do you use it?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Looks like another magic item to me...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Go on inside. We're heading to the first floor. Wait a moment though, I need to get a—
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...Where did they go?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Why's everything all different now?!
attributes.name: Laios's Party

attributes.content: Where are we? What just happened?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This place is looking more and more like a dungeon by the second.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...As I have foreseen.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Hey, aren't you the Cyclops from Sami?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: A Cyclops?! How do you know—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wait. If you're here, that means you saw something, right?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Then, what did you see?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: On your road ahead, there will be flames, a great shock... and a fearsome beast.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Do you know where Ceobe or the Doctor are?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ceobe has just returned. She should be at the training room now, which is that way.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: As for the Doctor... Please forgive me for not being able to tell you anything at the moment.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: So... where should we go first?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I don't think Mudrock will find us any time soon.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This is the training room the lady from earlier told us about.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Doesn't seem like there's anyone here. There's some great big strange thing over there...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What are you lot doing here with that gormless look on your faces?!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Eh? High Priest?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Have you seen Ceobe, High Priest?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: She was here a moment ago, but ran off somewhere.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: You guys looking for her?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't just stand there then, get your butts over here and sit in this machine!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Huh? Uh... Sure, okay.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: High Priest, did you happen to see some lost visitors? We heard they were spotted around here.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: What? No, I haven't. We're about to run an impact safety test on this new model of Big Ugly.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I suggest you stand back a bit.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Uh... Sure.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Alright, Zumama, everything's ready to go!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Of course I'm sure.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH—!
attributes.name: Cockpit-Encased Laios's Party

attributes.content: Was it just me or were there people inside that thing when it got blasted?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Are you sure about that? Did you see anyone get blasted?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Oh, huh... Guess not?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Just my imagination, then.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, go look somewhere else. The ones you're looking for aren't here.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Sure. Thanks.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I think this is what they call an 'abuse of power.'
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: They put me in a stew one time, I blew them up one time. Fair's fair.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Where'd you send them?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: They wanted to find Ceobe, so I sent them to her.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: That part's no lie.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: The smoke from the explosion clears, and the four find themselves experiencing the oddly-familiar feeling of floating in midair. As they regain their senses, gravity begins to do its work.
Surprisingly, it is P'o-shan Village rushing up to meet them. Dawn watches them with a peculiar expression on her face.
AHHHHHHH!!! HELP US—
attributes.name: Laios's Party

attributes.content: The four flail about in the air, to no avail.
However, it does not escape their notice that below them is not solid ground, but a near-infinitely deep well.
Instead of a cold, hard, and most-likely-fatal landing, they find themselves shooting straight into their hole of hope.
...A tad crude, but I guess that's how she will send them on their way.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: May we meet again someday.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Did Kay run into the kitchen again?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That she has.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: But she's been acting oddly this time around.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: How so?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's been unusually silent since her return.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I'll go have a chat with her, then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Kay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Are you alright? Do you feel unwell?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uhh... Dunno know how to describe it...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I've been feeling weird ever since I got back to the ship...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: If that's the case, why don't we go to Medical together and let the doctors have a look?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Don't wanna.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I dunno why, but I feel like... I should wait here by myself.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Oh. Alright then. Go get some rest, okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oww... My butt...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We're in... a kitchen?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Get behind me, Amiya!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Be careful, everyone!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Looks like High Priest sent us somewhere where they're not too friendly.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: High Priest? Who are you—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What was that?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It came from the room Kay's resting in!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Let's go take a look, quick!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: They mentioned Kay, we should follow them!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What... What in the world?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is that you, Kay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Tummy… hungry…
attributes.name: Ceobe?

attributes.content: What is going on here? Is this really the Kay we know?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Ceobe?

attributes.content: I can tell from her emotions that she's still Kay, the one we all know and love.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's still holding on, but she's about to lose control!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is... Is this really Kay?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: (Howls)
attributes.name: Ceobe?

attributes.content: What a handsome hound! I didn't know you could do this kind of thing, Kay!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Is this really the time for that?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We need to get her to her senses!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Guests.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Based on what you just said, I suppose you came out of concern for Kay's condition, correct?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, we came because we wanted to find a way back to our world... but we're still really worried for her!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Then let's save the questions for later and get her under control together!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we can't, then I'm afraid things will get far, far out of hand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Laios?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Sure. We'll work together, for now.
attributes.name: Laios
